text: mattu allāhanu nimagāgi nim'maḷagindalē jotegaḷannu sr̥ṣṭisidanu hāgū ā nim'ma jotegaḷa mūlaka nimage makkaḷannū mom'makkaḷannū nīḍidanu mattu avanu nimage śud'dhavāda jīvanāvaśyaka vastugaḷannu nīḍidanu. (Hīgiruttā) avarēnu asatyavannu nambuttāreyē? Mattu allāhana anugrahagaḷannu allagaḷeyuttāreyē
